abilities.description: Bloodlust: If it is missing at least half its HP, it is Berserk. Whenever it is Berserk, it can make 2 Attacks on its Turn instead of 1. Lemoniphobic: Frightened (Cd4) after seeing a lemon. Stench: All Near non-hodags that have to breathe are Sickened (while Near this Being).
